entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 45 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
